spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Grum'shar is a 1st-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence. He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When reduced to 0 hit points, Grum'shar drops to 1 hit point instead. He can only do this once per long rest.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 2} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.
